ValidationRule.description: Once an application is Accepted it should not be able to be edited unless user is a System Admin or WES System Admin.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordLocked__c = TRUE, Send_App_to_IFCS__c = TRUE, NOT(ISCHANGED(IFCS_Request_Body__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(IFCS_Request_Body__c)), $User.ProfileId <> "00e70000000tKvI", $User.ProfileId <> "00ee0000000Qed4" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not edit an application once it has been Accepted. Seek assistance from a System admin if the application needs to be resubmitted.
